Class STMPlantUmlSDGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.chenile.workflow.puml.STMPlantUmlSDGenerator
public class STMPlantUmlSDGenerator extends Object
Generates a PLANT UML state diagram for the State Transition Diagram. We let the PUML Styler give us all the styling based on styling.json. However, we support a "hard-coded" styling using MAIN_PATH for simplicity.
